## Help

The application allows to display and compare ratings of the players with classical FIDE ELO rating more than 2400.

This rating is an official measure of chess player strength. The list of registered players and their ratings is updated every month. It is available for [download](http://ratings.fide.com/download.phtml).

You can select multiple players by name and the plot shows historical changes of a rating since 2000.
Date range can be changed.
